text: ’d like to live as a poor man with lots of money.
author: PABLO PICASSO

text: Money is the best deodorant.
author: ELIZABETH TAYLOR

text: Lottery: A tax on people who are bad at math.
author: AMBROSE BIERCE

text: Money, like vodka, turns a person into an eccentric.
author: ANTON CHEKHOV

text: I’ve never been a millionaire but I know I’d be just darling at it.
author: DOROTHY PARKER

text: It’s amazing how fast later comes when you buy now.
author: MILTON BERLE

text: Most people work just hard enough not to get fired and get paid just enough money not to quit.
author: GEORGE CARLIN

text: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don’t need it.
author: BOB HOPE

text: Taking drugs and thinking that you are happy is like taking a loan and thinking you have money.
author: THIBAUT

text: People say that money is not the key to happiness, but I always figured if you have enough money, you can have a key made.
author: JOAN RIVERS

text: he quickest way to double your money is to fold it in half and put it in your back pocket.
author: WILL ROGERS

text: If you think nobody cares if you’re alive, try missing a couple of car payments.
author: EARL WILSON

text: Giving money and power to government is like giving whiskey and car keys to teenage boys.
author: P. J. O’ROURKE

text: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.
author: KINKY FRIEDMAN

text: Whoever said money can’t buy happiness simply didn’t know where to go shopping.
author: GERTRUDE STEIN

text: Spend your money on the things money can buy. Spend your time on the things money can’t buy.
author: HARUKI MURAKAMI

text: Invest in as much of yourself as you can, you are your own biggest asset by far.
author: WARREN BUFFETT

text: The ultimate purpose of money is so that you do not have to be in a specific place at a specific time doing anything you don’t want to do.
author: NAVAL RAVIKANT

text: Seek wealth, not money or status. Wealth is having assets that earn while you sleep. Money is how we transfer time and wealth. Status is your place in the social hierarchy.
author: NAVAL RAVIKANT

text: Wealth is not about having a lot of money; it’s about having a lot of options.
author: CHRIS ROCK

text: My favorite things in life don’t cost any money. It’s really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
author: STEVE JOBS

text: Success is having to worry about every damn thing in the world, except money.
author: JOHNNY CASH

text: Rich people are committed to being rich. Poor people want to be rich.
author: T. HARV EKER

text: Rich people think big. Poor people think small.
author: T. HARV EKER

text: Money is a way of measuring wealth but is not wealth in itself.
author: ALAN WATTS

text: The fools in life want things fast and easy — money, success, attention.
author: ROBERT GREENE

text: Rich people play the money game to win. Poor people play the money game to not lose.
author: T. HARV EKER

text: Someone’s sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
author: WARREN BUFFETT

text: Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.
author: ZIG ZIGLAR

text: The more you learn, the more you earn.
author: WARREN BUFFETT

text: Earn with your mind, not your time.
author: NAVAL RAVIKANT

text: When I had money everyone called me brother.
author: POLISH PROVERB

text: Not he who has much is rich, but he who gives much.
author: ERICH FROMM

text: Be your money’s master, not its slave.
author: PUBLILIUS SYRUS

text: Money doesn’t buy happiness – it buys freedom.
author: NAVAL RAVIKANT

text: It does not take money to make money.
author: ROBERT T. KIYOSAKI

text: A man in debt is so far a slave.
author: RALPH WALDO EMERSON

text: Money grows on the tree of persistence.
author: JAPANESE PROVERB

text: Words are the money of fools.
author: THOMAS HOBBES

text: The rich invest in time, the poor invest in money.
author: WARREN BUFFETT

text: If you make meaning, you’ll make money.
author: GUY KAWASAKI

text: Trade money for time, not time for money. You’re going to run out of time first.
author: NAVAL RAVIKANT

text: If it’s only about money we are hopeless. If it’s about people we are hopeful.
author: MAXIME LAGACÉ

text: Formal education will make you a living. Self-education will make you a fortune.
author: JIM ROHN

text: The best way to become a billionaire is to help a billion people.
author: PETER DIAMANDIS

text: We don’t make movies to make money, we make money to make more movies.
author: WALT DISNEY

text: Money is not the only answer, but it makes a difference.
author: BARACK OBAMA

text: If you can get paid for doing what you love, every paycheck is a bonus.
author: OPRAH WINFREY

text: We don’t build services to make money; we make money to build better services. And we think this is a good way to build something.
author: MARK ZUCKERBERG

text: We have always believed that it’s possible to make money without being evil.
author: LARRY PAGE

text: Capital as such is not evil; it is its wrong use that is evil. Capital in some form or other will always be needed.
author: MAHATMA GANDHI

text: If you cannot control your emotions, you cannot control your money.
author: WARREN BUFFETT

text: The funny thing is, the people who work really hard, they work really hard so they can sit on their ass – they just want to sit on their ass in nicer surroundings.
author: KARL PILKINGTON

text: I find out what the world needs. Then, I go ahead and invent it.
author: THOMAS A. EDISON

text: There is gold everywhere. Most people are not trained to see it.
author: ROBERT T. KIYOSAKI

text: Like Warren, I had a considerable passion to get rich, not because I wanted Ferraris – I wanted the independence. I desperately wanted it.
author: CHARLIE MUNGER

text: If your goal is to be comfortable, chances are you’ll never get rich. But if your goal is to be rich, chances are you’ll end up mighty comfortable.
author: T. HARV EKER

text: Rich people act in spite of fear. Poor people let fear stop them.
author: T. HARV EKER

text: Rich people choose to get paid based on results. Poor people choose to get paid based on time.
author: T. HARV EKER

text: Opportunity is a haughty goddess who wastes no time with those who are unprepared.
author: GEORGE S. CLASON

text: If you don’t find a way to make money while you sleep, you will work until you die.
author: WARREN BUFFETT

text: If you don’t get serious about your money, you will never have serious money.
author: GRANT CARDONE

text: It’s simple arithmetic: ‘Your income can grow only to the extent you do’.
author: T. HARV EKER

text: Stop buying things you don’t need, to impress people you don’t even like.
author: SUZE ORMAN

text: I make myself rich by making my wants few.
author: HENRY DAVID THOREAU

text: That man is richest whose pleasures are cheapest.
author: HENRY DAVID THOREAU

text: Don’t let making a living prevent you from making a life.
author: JOHN WOODEN

text: We buy things we don’t need with money we don’t have to impress people we don’t like.
author: TYLER DURDEN

text: If you didn’t get the deferred-gratification gene, you’ve got to work very hard to overcome that.
author: CHARLIE MUNGER

text: The rich invest their money and spend what is left; the poor spend their money and invest what is left.
author: JIM ROHN

text: It’s not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
author: ROBERT T. KIYOSAKI

text: Don’t just make money, make a difference.
author: GRANT CARDONE

text: Money moves from those who do not manage it to those who do.
author: DAVE RAMSEY

text: Money can’t buy happiness, but it will certainly get you a better class of memories.
author: RONALD REAGAN

text: Money won’t create success, the freedom to make it will.
author: NELSON MANDELA

text: Rich people focus on opportunities. Poor people focus on obstacles.
author: T. HARV EKER

text: Money has no grey areas. You either make it or you lose it.
author: KEVIN O’LEARY

text: Make your goal more than money. Make it about helping people and creating a better future.
author: MAXIME LAGACÉ

text: The goal isn’t more money. The goal is living life on your terms.
author: CHRIS BROGAN

text: You have to be myopic and completely focused and unbalanced in every way. Once you’ve achieved success, you’re free to do whatever you like.
author: KEVIN O’LEARY

text: It is better to have a permanent income than to be fascinating.
author: OSCAR WILDE

text: Fortune sides with him who dares.
author: VIRGIL

text: Keep your eye on the goal, keep moving toward your target.
author: T. HARV EKER

text: Where the determination is, the way can be found.
author: GEORGE S. CLASON

text: I always knew I was going to be rich. I don’t think I ever doubted it for a minute.
author: WARREN BUFFETT

text: If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free. If our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed.
author: EDMUND BURKE

text: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
author: AYN RAND

text: Many folks think they aren’t good at earning money, when what they don’t know is how to use it.
author: FRANK A. CLARK

text: I learned that lack of money erodes self-respect, and a noble dignity arises by earning a living.
author: JOHN SOFORIC

text: The accumulation of money is the fruition of a strong purpose that endures despite the obstacles.
author: JOHN SOFORIC

text: Only buy something that you’d be perfectly happy to hold if the market shuts down for ten years.
author: WARREN BUFFETT

text: Never complain about your troubles; they are responsible for more than half of your income.
author: ROBERT R. UPDEGRAFF

text: The money you make is a symbol of the value you create.
author: IDOWU KOYENIKAN

text: Making money isn’t hard in itself… What’s hard is to earn it doing something worth devoting one’s life to.
author: CARLOSE RUIZ ZAFRON

text: Waste your money and you’re only out of money, but waste your time and you’ve lost a part of your life.
author: MICHAEL LEBOEUF

text: Money is 80% behavior, 20% head knowledge. It’s what you do, not what you know.
author: DAVE RAMSEY

text: Lack of money is no obstacle. Lack of an idea is an obstacle.
author: KEN HAKUTA

text: Don’t tell me what you value, show me your budget, and I’ll tell you what you value.
author: JOE BIDEN

text: I don’t pay good wages because I have a lot of money; I have a lot of money because I pay good wages.
author: ROBERT BOSCH

text: Both poverty and riches are the offspring of thought.
author: NAPOLEON HILL

text: Don’t just make money, make a difference.
author: GRANT CARDONE

text: Put all good eggs in one basket and then watch that basket.
author: ANDREW CARNEGIE

text: It’s really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
author: STEVE JOBS

text: People say ‘I want to be rich.’ The question is, ‘Are you willing to do what it takes?
author: ROBERT T. KIYOSAKI

text: Never depend on single income. Make investments to create a second source.
author: WARREN BUFFETT

text: Broke is a temporary condition; poor is a state of mind.
author: SIR RICHARD FRANCIS BURTON

text: Everyday is a bank account, and time is our currency. No one is rich, no one is poor, we’ve got 24 hours each.
author: CHRISTOPHER RICE

text: Don’t let money run your life, let money help you run your life better.
author: JOHN RAMPON

text: The only difference between a rich person and a poor person is how they use their time.
author: ROBERT T. KIYOSAKI

text: Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
author: JIM ROHN

text: Money does not buy you happiness, but lack of money certainly buys you misery.
author: DANIEL KAHNEMAN

text: Making money is a common sense. It’s not rocket science. But unfortunately, when it comes to money, common sense is uncommon.
author: ROBERT T. KIYOSAKI

text: Money is like love; it kills slowly and painfully the one who withholds it, and enlivens the other who turns it on his fellow man.
author: KAHLIL GIBRAN

text: It is a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money.
author: ALBERT CAMUS

text: I will tell you the secret to getting rich on Wall Street. You try to be greedy when others are fearful. And you try to be fearful when others are greedy.
author: WARREN BUFFETT

text: They deem me mad because I will not sell my days for gold; and I deem them mad because they think my days have a price.
author: KAHLIL GIBRAN

text: Never spend your money before you have earned it.
author: THOMAS JEFFERSON

text: Never spend your money before you have earned it.
author: T. T. MUNGER

text: Money may not buy happiness, but I'd rather cry in a Jaguar than on a bus.
author: FRANÇOISE SAGAN

text: Many people take no care of their money till they come nearly to the end of it, and others do just the same with their time.
author: JOHANN WOLFGANG VON GOETHE

text: A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some.
author: JOE MOORE

text: Money isn't everything…but it ranks right up there with oxygen.
author: RITA DAVENPORT

text: Buy when everyone else is selling and hold until everyone else is buying.
author: J. PAUL GETTY

text: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
author: ROBERT T. KIYOSAKI

text: Every time you borrow money, you're robbing your future self.
author: NATHAN W. MORRIS

text: Investing should be more like watching paint dry or watching grass grow. If you want excitement, take $800 and go to Las Vegas.
author: PAUL SAMUELSON

text: Success is not the result of making money; earning money is the result of success – and success is in direct proportion to our service.
author: EARL NIGHTINGALE

text: The stock market is designed to transfer money from the active to the patient.
author: WARREN BUFFETT

text: If you don’t value your time, neither will others. Stop giving away your time and talents. Value what you know & start charging for it.
author: KIM GARST

text: If you want to get rich, remember that the way to do it is via equity, not salary.
author: SAM ALTMAN

text: The individual investor should act consistently as an investor and not as a speculator.
author: BEN GRAHAM

text: A sign of wealth: No longer needing an alarm clock to wake up.
author: GREG ISENBERG

text: How many millionaires do you know who have become wealthy by investing in savings accounts? I rest my case.
author: ROBERT G. ALLEN

text: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
author: DAVE RAMSEY

text: The definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over and expecting different results.
author: ALBERT EINSTEIN
